title: Referenced Memory in runtrace for OllyDBG 1.x
content:
I wanted to know if there is any way I could get the referenced memory in the run trace?
I tried using OllyDBG 2.x but it doesnt seem to work.

comments.text:
Please provide some more details, for example, which commands you perform to get the run trace and what output you get. As far as I know, 
Trace
->
Run hit trace
and then 
View
->
Run trace
should show you the memory referenced.

I use the same steps to see the trace...Trace->Run hit trace and then View->Run trace. However it only shows the modified registers and not the referenced memory. I also checked if there were any options to toggle memory references for the trace but didnt find any.
